question:
To qualify as a hot spot, a region must meet which of the following criterias?
1) The region must contain at least 1,500 species of vascular plants.
2) It has to have lost at least 70% of its original habitat.
Select the correct answers from the codes given below:
explanation:
To qualify as a hot spot, a region must meet the following criteria:
1) The region must contain at least 1,500 species of vascular plants.
2) It has to have lost at least 70% of its original habitat.
